channel.title: Data Engineering on Michael
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on Michael

item.title: Udacity Data Engineering Nano Degree Projects
item.description: The course includes 5 projects listed below. Data Modeling Learn to create relational and NoSQL data models to fit the diverse needs of data consumers. Use ETL to build databases in PostgreSQL and Apache Cassandra. Cloud Data Warehouses Sharpen your data warehousing skills and deepen your understanding of data infrastructure. Create cloud-based data warehouses on Amazon Web Services (AWS). Spark and Data Lakes Understand the big data ecosystem and how to use Spark to work with massive datasets.
